World.Name: Aaron
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Aaron understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Aaron can track the animals in the area February, 1051: Aaron learns which way is North March, 1051: Aaron learns how to hold a breath April, 1051: Aaron learns all about the creation story May, 1051: Aaron learns to talk to the clouds with her hands together June, 1051: Aaron stops trying to heal people with the power of positive thinking July, 1051: Aaron can massage out sore muscles August, 1051: Aaron learns to make a rudimetary fire September, 1051: Aaron: Oh No! Bullies! Bullies!: Time for a Beating! Aaron
September, 1051: Your Athletics skill is put to the test... (Requires 10 points) You cannot outrun the bullies, they catch and beat you You are afraid You are Depressed
October, 1051: Aaron learns how to wax cars, sand floors and paint fences November, 1051: Aaron changes belt from white to another colour. Trousers still stay up. December, 1051: Aaron learns how to float on the surface without drowning January, 1052: Aaron can now swim for about 10 metres in the doggy paddle style February, 1052: Aaron is in Swimming Training and practicing existing skills March, 1052: Aaron has done enough training to do a montage April, 1052: Aaron is in Unarmed Combat Training and practicing existing skills May, 1052: Aaron knows Kung Fu.... June, 1052: Aaron has stopped trying to hit people and hits people July, 1052: Aaron learns 'crane' technique that no can defense August, 1052: Aaron is in Unarmed Combat Training and practicing existing skills September, 1052: Aaron is in Unarmed Combat Training and practicing existing skills October, 1052: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Unarmed Combat Training November, 1052: Aaron is in Medic Training and practicing existing skills December, 1052: Aaron can bandage minor cuts January, 1053: Aaron can create antidotes for most known poisons February, 1053: Aaron is in Medic Training and practicing existing skills March, 1053: Aaron learns to make a splint for broken bones April, 1053: Aaron learns to stitch up otherwise fatal wounds May, 1053: Aaron is in Medic Training and practicing existing skills June, 1053: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Medic Training July, 1053: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Medic Training August, 1053: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Medic Training September, 1053: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Medic Training October, 1053: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Medic Training November, 1053: Aaron learns to look with eyes, not with hands December, 1053: Aaron can swim 50 metre lengths January, 1054: Aaron can dive to the bottom, gather stones and make it back to the surface. February, 1054: Aaron learns to open doors that aren't locked March, 1054: Aaron learns to break into combination locks - with a hammer April, 1054: Aaron learns to unlock doors after several attempts May, 1054: Aaron learns to look with eyes, not with hands June, 1054: Aaron learns to stick 'em with the pointy end July, 1054: Aaron learns to make the weapon an extension of their body August, 1054: Aaron is in Athletics Training and practicing existing skills September, 1054: Aaron learns that a man cannot push a button, if you disable his hand October, 1054: Aaron learns that the sword really IS mighter than the quill. November, 1054: Aaron is going to have to be registered AS a lethal weapon December, 1054: Aaron is in Athletics Training and practicing existing skills January, 1055: Aaron is in Athletics Training and practicing existing skills February, 1055: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Athletics Training March, 1055: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Athletics Training April, 1055: Aaron can loot items from a corpse May, 1055: Aaron can steal from a bag in the same room if the target isn't present June, 1055: Aaron can use the 'what's that behind you?' distraction technique July, 1055: Aaron has a basic grasp that forces are at work in the universe August, 1055: Aaron understands the concepts of mass and gravity September, 1055: Aaron is in Scientific Training and practicing existing skills October, 1055: Aaron understands how electricity and magetism works November, 1055: Aaron understands how to generate and transfer heat December, 1055: Aaron is in Scientific Training and practicing existing skills January, 1056: Aaron understands how light is both a wave and a particle February, 1056: Aaron understands the concept of spacetime March, 1056: Aaron is in Scientific Training and practicing existing skills April, 1056: Aaron learns to stick 'em with the pointy end May, 1056: Aaron learns to make the weapon an extension of their body June, 1056: Aaron is in Weapons Training and practicing existing skills July, 1056: Aaron learns that a man cannot push a button, if you disable his hand August, 1056: Aaron learns that the sword really IS mighter than the quill. September, 1056: Aaron is going to have to be registered AS a lethal weapon October, 1056: Aaron is in Weapons Training and practicing existing skills November, 1056: Aaron is in Weapons Training and practicing existing skills December, 1056: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training January, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training February, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training March, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training April, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training May, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training June, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training July, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training August, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training September, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training October, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training November, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training December, 1057: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training January, 1058: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training February, 1058: Aaron cannot learn anything new in Weapons Training March, 1058: Aaron is in Faith Training and practicing existing skills April, 1058: Aaron learns to read star signs
